name: Across The Cave
description:
Countless stories exist about people who have died in the cave but you have no option but to go through it.
Can you do it?

Controls: X and arrow keys

I made this game in 9 days, my purpouse was to make something simple that everybody could enjoy and proved succesful. If you have the oportunity to play it with people I really encourage it.

The game is short, simple and at the same time challenging

Created by Nehemek Amador

Special thanks to Rebeca Petrakyz

PD:

1)Some things are meant to be that way.

2)English is not my primary language, if you find any spelling mistake or something similar please report it, I would really apreciate it.
